Text: Just Another Romantic Wrestling Comedy is a 2006 film starring April Hunter and Joanie Laurer.

Triplets:<Just Another Romantic Wrestling Comedy
1:
--------------------
Text: Just Another Romantic Wrestling Comedy:  This Romantic comedy film was premiered at New Jersey and New York City on December 1, 2006 and was released on DVD in the United States and the United Kingdom on April 17, 2007.
Triplets:<New Jersey
2:
--------------------
Text: Just Another Romantic Wrestling Comedy:  After the film's DVD release "Just Another Romantic Wrestling Comedy" won an "Honorable Mention" award at the New Jersey International Festival awards.
